offline.q:
Cant't connect to the cloud.

It looks like you don't have the internet connection.

deleteVendor.q: Do you really want to delete ${ vName }?

newVersion.q: A new version of the App is available.
newVersion.n:
Don't update it yet.
I will reload the app manually.

local.q: To load the database automaticaly you can save it in the LPM App.
local.y:
OK!
Save the database in the App!
local.n:
No, don't do it.
I will load the database manually.

dbxFile.q: Would you like to synchronise the App to the Dropbox?

localFile.q: Would you like to synchronise the App with a Local File?

local.q:
You are about to disconnect the Quick Access Database from this device.

You may not be able to use the App without an internet connection.
No other synchronised databases will be affected.
local.y:
Yes!

Remove the Quick Access Database from this device.

dbxFile.q:
You are about to disconnect the Dropbox Database.
The App database will not be synchronised with the Dropbox Database.
The App permission to use the Dropbox will be revoked.

localFile.q:
You are about to disconnect the Database File.
The App database will not longer be synchronised with the your Database File.

local.q: The local Quick Access Database exists. Are you sure you want to create a new Database?
local.y:
Yes I do!
Remove the existing Quick Access Database.

dbxFile.q: There is an existing connection to the Dropbox Database. What do we do?
dbxFile.y:
Remove the current connection to the Dropbox Database.

I understand that I may lose all the data.
dbxFile.n: Oh... I didn't realise that. Do not delete the connection. I want to use it

localFile.q: There is an existing connection to the Database File. What do we do?
localFile.y: Remove the current connection to the Database File.
localFile.n: Do not delete the connection. I want to use it

update.q:
The ${ sName } has ${ sAge } content than the App data.

The ${ sName } was modified: ${ sMod }
The App data was modified: ${ aMod }

What do we do?
update.y:
The ${ sName } is wrong.

Keep the App data.

${ isAlter }
update.n:
The ${ sName } is correct.

Keep the ${ sName } data.

Update the App data to match the ${ sName }.
update.alter: Update the ${ sName } to match the App data.
update.noAlter: CAUTION: The ${ sName } wil NOT be updated.

localFileLoadOrCreate.q: Do you have an existing Database File?
localFileLoadOrCreate.y:
Yes. I already have an existing Database File

Let me connect to it
localFileLoadOrCreate.n:
I need to create a new Database File

Just let me save it...

localFileLoadOrDownload.q: You can't synchronise the Database File of this device.
localFileLoadOrDownload.y: I wan't to upload a new Database File.
localFileLoadOrDownload.n: I want to download a copy of the current database.

catchLoad.q: There is a problem with the ${ sName } connection.
catchLoad.y: Lets remove the connection and reload the App.
catchLoad.n: No! Just ignore it for the time beign!

catchSync.q:
Can't Synchronise the ${ sName }

The computer says:

${ cErr }

catchUpdate.q:
Can't update the ${ sName }.

.

The connection will be removed.

${ cErr }

message.existingDb: Please enter password to your Database
message.existingOrNew: Please enter password to your existing Database or click New Database icon.
message.newDb: To create a new Database, please enter a new, strong password.
message.loggedOff: You have been logged off after inactivity. Re-input your password to unlock the database.
message.loadBd: Load the database or create a new one
message.dbFailed: Database file is corrupted or cannot be unlocked. You have ${ count } more attempts to unlock it...
message.appFailed: Something went wrong... The App can't start. Try to reload the App
message.passShort: Master Password must be at least 10 characters long.
message.logShort: Account Login must be at least 6 characters long.
message.nameShort: Account Name must be at least 4 characters long.
message.deleteVendorReject: The '${ vName }' Account has not been removed.
message.deleteVendorFailed: Ooops! There is a problem... Can't save the change. The '${ vName }' Account has not been removed.
message.submitFormFailed: Ooops! There is a problem... Can't save the change for the '${ vName }' Account.
message.submitPassFailed: Ooops! There is a problem... Can't save the new Password the '${ vName }' Account. The Password has not been changed.
message.vendorExists: Account name: '${ vName }' is already in use! Choose another name.
message.exitAppConfirm: Press the Back Button again to exit the App.
message.fileHandlerFailed: The FileHandler failed. The Database File cannot be modified. Choose the Database File using the FileReader.
message.noFilePickedErr: No file was uploaded using the FileReader. Database cannot be loaded...
message.pickFileFR: Choose the Database File using the FileReader. Database cannot be modified...
message.offline: No internet connection. Can't sync the cloud.
